Notes.Text:
This update for rubygem-passenger fixes the following issues: 

- CVE-2015-7519: rubygem-passenger was not filtering the environment like apache is doing, allowing injection
of environment variables (bsc#956281)

Vulnerabilities.Description: agent/Core/Controller/SendRequest.cpp in Phusion Passenger before 4.0.60 and 5.0.x before 5.0.22, when used in Apache integration mode or in standalone mode without a filtering proxy, allows remote attackers to spoof headers passed to applications by using an _ (underscore) character instead of a - (dash) character in an HTTP header, as demonstrated by an X_User header.
